the role of nutrition in pregnancy and lactation, exocrine and sports as also food allergy
the role of nutrition in pregnancy and lactation, exocrine and sports as also food allergy
The chapters on nutrition in pregnancy, exercise, food allergies and intolerance, etc are informative and will be a good read for students in the respective field
The chapters on nutrition in pregnancy, exercise, food allergies and intolerance, etc are informative and will be a good read for students in the respective field

It would have been worthwhile to include some more topics such as management of severely acute malnutrition, examples of high, low and moderate glycaemic index foods, how to read food labels (with examples), etc and also additional references for further reading would have been beneficial as the chapters are a quick guide to appraise the topic
